The Product Therapist

Stevo earned his nickname the Product Therapist by applying the 1,200 hours of supervised counseling skills training from his MA in Psychology to better understanding users... and the people that make products for them.

Stuff Stevo has made

Supernatural

An award-winning Virtual Reality fitness app for Quest. Thousands of workouts loved by millions.

  • Acquired by Meta

Elevate Security

An integrated human risk platform that prevents threats targeting human error within organizations.

  • Acquired by Mimecast

Tonal

The ultimate at-home strength training system. Innovative hardware, firmware, software, and content.

  • Visit the Company

Habitry

A cutting edge behavior change app for coaches, then health product consultancy.

  • Sold in 2019
